verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H5414"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w keep|strong="H7673"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w thy|strong="H2232"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w prune|strong="H2168"\w* \w thy|strong="H2232"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* gather \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* thereof;

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w solemn|strong="H7677"\w* \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w prune|strong="H2168"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

\w That|strong="H8141"\w* which \w groweth|strong="H5599"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* itself \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w thy|strong="H6025"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w thy|strong="H6025"\w* \w undressed|strong="H5139"\w* vine \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gather|strong="H1219"\w*: \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w solemn|strong="H7677"\w* \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* land \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* food \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*; \w for|strong="H5650"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w thy|strong="H5650"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w thy|strong="H5650"\w* maid, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w thy|strong="H5650"\w* \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w for|strong="H5650"\w* \w thy|strong="H5650"\w* \w stranger|strong="H8453"\w* \w that|strong="H5650"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee;

\w and|strong="H2416"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* thy cattle, \w and|strong="H2416"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* thy land, \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* \w thereof|strong="H2416"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* food.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w number|strong="H5608"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* thee, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w even|strong="H7651"\w* forty \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w send|strong="H5674"\w* abroad \w the|strong="H3605"\w* loud \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*; \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w send|strong="H5674"\w* abroad \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w ye|strong="H6942"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H4940"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w thereof|strong="H3427"\w*: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w ye|strong="H6942"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* possession, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w ye|strong="H6942"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H5139"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*: \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w groweth|strong="H5599"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w itself|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w gather|strong="H1219"\w* \add the grapes \add*\w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w undressed|strong="H5139"\w* \w vines|strong="H5139"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*; \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w unto|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: ye \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* thereof \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* \w ye|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H8141"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w every|strong="H7725"\w* man \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* possession.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* aught \w unto|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*, \w or|strong="H4376"\w* \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, ye \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrong|strong="H3238"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w another|strong="H5997"\w*:

\w According|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w price|strong="H4736"\w* \w thereof|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fewness|strong="H4591"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w diminish|strong="H4591"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w price|strong="H4736"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w crops|strong="H8393"\w* doth \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w unto|strong="H4736"\w* \w thee|strong="H7235"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wrong|strong="H3238"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H5997"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Wherefore \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H6213"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w in|strong="H3427"\w* safety.

\w And|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w ye|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* eat \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w fill|strong="H7648"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* safety.

\w And|strong="H8141"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* say, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*? \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* gather \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*:

\w then|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H1293"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H1293"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w forth|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8141"\w* ye \w shall|strong="H8141"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* eat \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w old|strong="H3465"\w* store; \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w her|strong="H5704"\w* \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* \w come|strong="H8393"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w*, ye \w shall|strong="H8141"\w* eat \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w old|strong="H3465"\w* store.

\w And|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* perpetuity; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w mine|strong="H5978"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w sojourners|strong="H8453"\w* \w with|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* possession \w ye|strong="H5414"\w* shall \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H1350"\w* brother \w be|strong="H3588"\w* waxen \w poor|strong="H4134"\w*, \w and|strong="H7138"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* some \w of|strong="H1350"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* possession, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1350"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1350"\w* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* \w unto|strong="H7138"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* come, \w and|strong="H7138"\w* \w shall|strong="H1350"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* brother \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w*.
